name: Gruple
description:
Small puzzle game, made in about a month and half.

30+ levels.Choose any levels from easy to hard in any order! Stuck on 1 puzzle? Try another!

Main goal of this was to make game with simple single mechanic,what is easy to understand,but have tricks to provide a challenge.I want to release a game in end of October 2021,but some design difficulties made it harder.So here we are,several months later)

If you played this masterpiece leave a comment,this wiil help(i hope) alot!
